text: Founder of CPP-IPR Prof. S. Bujarbarua Sarbeswar Bujarbarua is an Indian physicist. Educated at Gujrat University and Gauhati University, he founded the Centre of Plasma Physics as part of the Institute for Plasma Research and served as its director for 30 years. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:Indian physicists Category:Plasma physicists Category:Space scientists Category:Gujarat University alumni
title: Sarbeswar Bujarbarua
